entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023
